titlestmt.titleproper: A Guide to the Ford Foundation records, Administration FA1669

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2022-01-01 04:01:42 -0500.
profiledesc.langusage: Description is written in: English, Latin script.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Records more than 10 years old are open for research, unless otherwise noted. Brittle or damaged items are available at the discretion of RAC.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: Arranged in collections by file type or originating office/department. Additional finding aids are created as records are processed and open for research.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Includes the records of the following offices or departments: Office of the President, Office of the Vice President, Associate Director, Board of Trustees, Building Services, Comptroller, Executive Officer Files, Information Services, Personnel Services, Board on Overseas Training and Research, Office of Communications, Office of Finance, Office of Management Services and Office of Reports.
